Path of Least Resistance.name: Path of Least Resistance
Path of Least Resistance.flavor: The power of your dragon mark guides your strike, and its magic lingers in the wound, weakening your foeâ€™s defenses.
Path of Least Resistance.attack: Strength vs. lowest of Fortitude, Reflex, or Will (melee) or Dexterity vs. lowest of Fortitude, Reflex, or Will (ranged)
Path of Least Resistance.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). Until the start of your next turn, the target takes a -2 penalty to the defense you hit.

Distant Quarry.name: Distant Quarry
Distant Quarry.flavor: Your dragon mark pulses with energy as you identify a distant foe as your quarry.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You designate one enemy that you can see as your quarry.
Distant Quarry.effect: You designate one enemy that you can see as your quarry.

Path of Destruction.name: Path of Destruction
Path of Destruction.flavor: Your dragon mark flashes as you deliver a devastating attack. You then take a couple of steps and unleash another crippling assault.
Path of Destruction.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Path of Destruction.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The target gains vulnerable 1 to all damage until the end of the encounter.
Path of Destruction.effect: Shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Path of Destruction.secondaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Path of Destruction.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The secondary target gains vulnerable 1 to all damage until the end of the encounter. If you hit the same creature with both the primary and secondary attacks, it gains vulnerable 2 to all damage until the end of the encounter.
